title: Yoncalı
description: Yoncalı is located near the modern cities of Malazgirt and Bulanık, at the western end of the Bulanık-Malazgirt plain. The Assyrian king Tiglat-pileser I had a placed an inscribed, rock-cut relief here to commemorate his victories in the region.

properties.description: Coordinates of the monument following GeoHack.
properties.title: Imagery location of Yoncalı
